data.title: go2films
data.text:
Welcome! If you're part of a community, festival, or organization and wish to organize a screening with us, we're thrilled to work with you! Let us know more about your request, and we'll do our best to make it a cinematic success.

If you're a buyer or programmer looking for a screener, please feel free to use the 'Industry Screening Room' button instead.

Name*

Email*

Organization*

Job Title*

Phone Number

Name of film*

Tell us more about the screening you have in mind!*

CAPTCHA

Comments

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

Δ

For universities, libraries, and organizations planning screenings without charging admission fees, this is the perfect option for you. Choose the right license type for your educational screening needs below and be sure to read the exact terms.

Institution Type License Type Format

I confirm my interest in this license and acknowledge that I have read and understood the terms outlined above.

Exclusively for Film Industry Professionals

Our Industry Screening Room is designed for film industry professionals, such as festival programmers, buyers, and commissioning editors. Please note that we will only approve requests from individuals actively involved in the film industry.

New User? Sign Up Now!

If you are a film industry professional, create a unique username and password to gain exclusive access to our curated collection of films.

Important Note:

We appreciate the interest of all film enthusiasts, but this platform is exclusively for industry professionals. Requests from individuals not associated with the film industry will not be approved. Need assistance? Contact Nur at [email protected] for prompt support.

Thank you for your understanding.

Login Form

Username(Required)

Password(Required)

Remember Me

Synopsis

In the glow of Israel’s 1967 victory, “A Star is Born” meets the Israeli reality in this captivating musical. It follows two couples from Kibbutz Netzer Sirani, whose lives take dramatic turns post-war. At the heart is Neta Agmon, whose acting career takes off just as her husband comes back from the war, forever changed. While Neta’s star rises, she faces a personal battle at home, trying to reconnect with the man she once knew. Amidst a nation celebrating, they navigate the unseen aftermath of war and the challenge of keeping love alive. This story blends personal struggle with the vibrancy of a musical, offering a fresh and engaging take on the impact of war, the price of fame, and the power of love.
